title: Collimate offers tool to predict downlink success
summary: SAN FRANCISCO – Collimate Space, a new Silicon Valley startup, aims to tackle a specific problem for satellite operators. Collimate offers a tool for predicting the success of satellite downlinks, […]

title: La NASA invita a los medios al lanzamiento de Europa Clipper
summary: Read this release in English here. La NASA y SpaceX tienen planificado que la ventana para el lanzamiento de la misión Europa Clipper se abra el jueves 10 de octubre. Esta misión ayudará a los científicos a determinar si una de las lunas heladas de Júpiter podría albergar vida. Esta misión de la NASA despegará a […]

title: ESA scrubs swan song launch of its Vega rocket due to “electrical issues”
summary: The European Space Agency (ESA) will soon focus on the Vega-C rocket as its small launch vehicle. Liftoff is set for Wednesday, Sept. 4, at 10:50 p.m. GFT (9:50 p.m. EDT, 0150 UTC).

title: Telesat sells remote communications services business
summary: Canadian geostationary operator Telesat has sold off Infosat Communications, a remote satellite services specialist, to bolster finances as investments in its low Earth orbit Lightspeed constellation ramp up.

title: El X-59 de la NASA avanza en las pruebas de preparación para volar
summary: Read this story in English here. El equipo que prepara el X-59 de la NASA continúa realizando pruebas en preparación para que el avión supersónico y silencioso realice su primer vuelo. Esto incluye un trío de importantes pruebas estructurales e inspecciones críticas en el camino hacia el vuelo. El X-59 es un avión experimental que […]

title: SpaceX Starlink faces sanctions in Brazil over Elon Musk’s X access
summary: SpaceX’s high-speed internet service, Starlink, is facing sanctions in Brazil after Elon Musk’s X was blocked by the government last week. The...

title: FrankenVega Confirmed for Sentinel 2C Launch
summary: The final launch of an Avio rocket may have already taken place. Tomorrow’s launch will feature the first and only mission launched aboard the lesser-known FrankenVega. In late 2023, European Spaceflight reported that Avio had managed to lose two of four propellant tanks needed for the fourth stage of its final Vega rocket. The tanks […]

title: 40 Years Ago: STS-41D – First Flight of Space Shuttle Discovery
summary: On Aug. 30, 1984, space shuttle Discovery lifted off on the STS-41D mission, joining NASA’s fleet as the third space qualified orbiter. The newest shuttle incorporated newer technologies making it significantly lighter than its two predecessors. Discovery lofted the heaviest payload up to that time in shuttle history. The six-person crew included five NASA astronauts […]

title: La NASA invita a creadores de las redes sociales al lanzamiento de la misión Europa Clipper
summary: Read this article in English here La NASA invita a los creadores de contenido digital a inscribirse para asistir al lanzamiento de la nave espacial Europa Clipper, la cual recopilará datos para ayudar a los científicos a determinar si Europa, la luna helada de Júpiter, podría albergar vida. title: NASA Invites Media to View Launch of Jupiter Moon Mission
summary: NASA and SpaceX are targeting a launch period opening Thursday, Oct. 10, for the agency’s Europa Clipper mission, which will help scientists determine if one of Jupiter’s icy moons could support life. The mission will launch on a SpaceX Falcon Heavy rocket from Launch Complex 39A at NASA’s Kennedy Space Center in Florida. Europa Clipper […]
